front.title: Traffic Engineering and Service Mapping Yang Model

abstract.t: This document provides a YANG data model to map service model (e.g., L3SM) and Traffic Engineering model (e.g., TE Tunnel or ACTN VN model). This model is referred to as TE service Mapping Model. This model is applicable to the operation's need for a seamless control and management of their VPN services with TE tunnel support.
